languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} Паскаля вырвать богохульный ксенотех из своей плоти.
Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} Паскаля вырвать богохульный ксенотех из своей плоти.

traits.locale_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

languages.text: 你说服了帕斯卡，让他将亵渎神明的异形科技造物从身体中扯下来。
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

traits.locale_text: 你说服了帕斯卡，让他将亵渎神明的异形科技造物从身体中扯下来。

languages.text: Pasqal überzeugt, die profane Xenotech aus seinem Körper zu reißen.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal überzeugt, die profane Xenotech aus seinem Körper zu reißen.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu Pasqal de débarrasser son corps de la xénotechnologie profane.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu Pasqal de débarrasser son corps de la xénotech profane.

languages.text: Has convencido a Pasqal para que arranque la xenotecnología profana de su cuerpo.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido a Pasqal para que arranque la xenotecnología profana de su cuerpo.

languages.text: パスカルの体から冒涜的な異星技術を引き剥がすよう説得した。
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

traits.locale_text: パスカルの体から冒涜的な異星技術を引き剥がすよう説得した。

languages.text: Pasqal'ı, kâfir zeno teknolojisini vücudundan sökmeye ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to tear the profane xenotech from his body.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal'ı kâfir zeno teknolojisini vücudundan sökmeye ikna ettin.
